attributes.action: Cancel the invitation to Donald Trump to make a state visit to Britain.
attributes.additional_details: Consider the disruption caused by the recent Extinction Rebellion protests. Anti-Trump protests will be more widespread and more expensive.
attributes.background: Spending vast sums of money to prevent Trump realising how much he is disliked by large numbers of the British populace, and at the same time celebrating a totally amoral man, is unforgivable.
